rows.label: qst001201_msg001
rows.name: You! Yes, you there!

rows.label: qst001201_msg002
rows.name:
You, who so thoroughly
stimulates my creative spirit!

rows.label: qst001201_msg003
rows.name:
Ah, what a truly magnificent
form! I'd love to paint
a portrait of you.

rows.label: qst001201_msg004
rows.name:
But unfortunately, what I
need to ask of you right
now is something else.

rows.label: qst001201_msg005
rows.name:
I was painting a landscape as
usual, but I ran out of paint!

rows.label: qst001201_msg006
rows.name:
My paints are specially made,
you see. I make them myself.

rows.label: qst001201_msg007
rows.name:
To get good colors, you need good
materials. A good painting is born
from a commitment to every last detail!

rows.label: qst001201_msg009
rows.name: I usually ask a mercenary I know...

rows.label: qst001201_msg010
rows.name:
But it seems he's busy with preparations
for the war with Superbia. Because of
that, his rates have gone up.

rows.label: qst001201_msg011
rows.name:
For a painter of my stature,
the price is just too high.

rows.label: qst001201_msg013
rows.name:
Just as I was wondering what to
do, you appeared before me!

rows.label: qst001201_msg014
rows.name: Our meeting here must be fate!

rows.label: qst001201_msg015
rows.name:
I'd like to ask you to gather
the materials for my paints!

rows.label: qst001201_msg016
rows.name:
I can't give you money, but I'll
give you a useful tool instead.

rows.label: qst001201_msg017
rows.name:
What do you say? Will
you accept my request?

rows.label: qst001201_msg018
rows.name: Thank you!

rows.label: qst001201_msg019
rows.name:
I need you to bring me some
Crustip Chitin and Tricolor Rock.

rows.label: qst001201_msg020
rows.name:
You can get Crustip Chitin
by defeating the Krim Crustips
near Farlaine Wells.

rows.label: qst001201_msg021
rows.name:
You can find Tricolor Rock in
the rocky areas of Invidia.

rows.label: qst001201_msg022
rows.name: Well then, I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst001201_msg101
rows.name:
I can't wait to make my paints and
start painting... Then I can sell the
painting and have a delicious meal...

rows.label: qst001201_msg102
rows.name:
Right, you want to know about
the paint ingredients, yes?

rows.label: qst001201_msg103
rows.name:
You can get Crustip Chitin
by defeating the Krim Crustips
near Farlaine Wells.

rows.label: qst001201_msg104
rows.name:
You can find Tricolor Rock in
the rocky areas of Invidia.

rows.label: qst001201_msg201
rows.name:
Oh! This is it, this is it! There's
no doubt this is what I wanted!

rows.label: qst001201_msg202
rows.name:
You've been a great help. Now
I can finish my painting!

rows.label: qst001201_msg203
rows.name: What should we ask?

rows.label: qst001201_msg204
rows.name: Ask what she'll do when it's finished.

rows.label: qst001201_msg205
rows.name: Ask why she was in such a hurry.

rows.label: qst001201_msg206
rows.name:
I'm going to sell it to
a noble named Isolde.

rows.label: qst001201_msg207
rows.name:
Isolde-san loves landscape paintings.
This one is turning out quite well,
so I'm sure she'll like it.

rows.label: qst001201_msg208
rows.name:
If she does, I'll be able
to eat for a while.

rows.label: qst001201_msg210
rows.name: Because I'm hungry, of course!

rows.label: qst001201_msg211
rows.name:
If I couldn't finish this, I wouldn't
be able to sell the painting, and I
wouldn't have any money for food!

rows.label: qst001201_msg212
rows.name:
But thanks to you, it looks like
I'll be able to finish it.

rows.label: qst001201_msg213
rows.name:
I'm sure it will sell for a high price,
and I'll be able to live without worrying
about my next meal for a while.

rows.label: qst001201_msg214
rows.name:
Oh, I haven't given
you your reward yet.

rows.label: qst001201_msg215
rows.name:
Here you go... I'm sure
it will be useful.

rows.label: qst001201_msg216
rows.name:
No, thank *you*. Next time we
meet, you'll have to be my model!
